gthni: No it's not that simple, I wouldn't mind if there was a catagory called "dubbed" (or possibly just "spanish" to be realistic...).

Since most of TPB's users have no interest whatsoever in spanish dubbed films or any other shit (ok except perhaps the porn), it's unfair that we have to filter tru all the spanish torrents being uploaded, this can sometimes make it hard when you want to scan tru the new torrents, I don't have to tell anyone here how irriting it can be cuz sometimes the site is FLOODED with their shit.
Furthermore, logically this extra traffic slows down the server .
Ok, so does all the other stuff being upload. The difference is that this extra traffic and the owerwhelming numbers of spanish torrents is only interesting for a minority of the users. 

That is called minority tyranny. 

kaBAM baby! lazy parasitic losers.

I'm not much of a supporter of script-kiddies and lame hack-attempts, but in this case I'll make an exception and say that if anyone feels like DDoS'ing limitedivx.com for, say an hour or so, every time someone floods this site with spanish torrents, they have my blessing.

Ok, so you dont like spanish movies, fare enough, me either, and i have lived in spain since i was born (well, not completely true, actually i'm living in the netherlands) but it's a bit annoying as well to hear people picking on every single spaniard just because of some bastards that make use of this web site for movies that are not in english. Thanks and keep up the good movies in english (and the porn in any language, i understand that)  :)
Nobody is saying anything demeaning against spanish people as a whole, just the idiots who are exploiting the pirate bay and thereby constantly irritating the rest of us!
Check :) I think the administrator of this website should just ban these movies if it bothers as many people as it does.
